create_post_child_comment_parent_comment: The comment you are trying to reply to was not found. It is not possible to reply to a comment that does not exist
create_post_child_comment_post_not_found: The post related to the comment you are trying to reply to was not found. It is not possible to reply to a comment on a post that does not exist
create_post_comment_reaction_post_commen: The comment you are trying to react to was not found. It is not possible to react to a comment that does not exist
create_post_comment_reaction_user_alread: The user has already reacted to this comment, it is not possible to react to the comment again
delete_post_comment_reaction_post_commen: The comment was not found. It is not possible to delete a reaction from a comment that does not exist
delete_post_comment_reaction_user_has_no: The reaction you are trying to delete was not found. It is not possible to eliminate a reaction that does not exist
delete_post_comment_parent_comment_not_f: It is not possible to delete the reply. The answer/comment does not exist
delete_post_comment_post_comment_cannot_: It is not possible to delete the comment/reply. Please try again later
delete_post_comment_post_comment_not_fou: The comment or reply you are trying to delete was not found
delete_post_comment_post_not_found_error: The post related to the comment you are trying to delete does not exist. It is not possible to delete a comment from a post that does not exist
post_reaction_does_not_exist_error_messa: User have not yet reacted to this post
post_save_cannot_remove_saved_post_error: Post cannot be removed from saved post user's list
post_save_post_already_on_saved_post_err: Post has already been saved by user
post_save_post_does_not_belong_to_user_s: Post does not belong to saved post user's list
post_video_no_sources_error_message:
The video does not exist or was removed due to copyright.
You can report the video and we will try to fix it if possible.
something_went_wrong_error_message: Something went wrong while trying to perform the operation. Try later
user_already_reacted_to_post_error_messa: User have already reacted to this post
user_forbidden_resource_error_message: The user does not have access to the resource
user_must_be_authenticated_error_message: You must sign in to perform this action
user_not_found_error_message: The user who made the request does not exist. Logging out
